name: jira-connector
description: Easy to use NodeJS wrapper for the Jira REST API.

scripts.postversion: jsdoc -c jsdoc.json && git add -A docs && git commit -m "Update docs to $npm_package_version" && git subtree push --prefix "docs/jira-connector/$npm_package_version" origin gh-pages && git push && git push --tags

author: Caleb Brinkman <floralvikings@gmail.com>
